name: df-sgns
body: |- wceq(csgns, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpt(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), cif(nat0, cif(nat1, cneg(nat1), wbr(cfv(c0g, cv(s0)), cfv(cplt, cv(s0)), cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s1), cfv(c0g, cv(s0)))))))
comment: Signum function for a structure. See also ~ df-sgn for the version for extended reals. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 10-Sep-2018.)
